s = raw_input()
arr = []
o = 0
k = 0 #
index = 0#
for i in range(len(s)):
    if s[i] == '(':
        o += 1
    elif s[i] == ')':
        o -= 1
    else:
        if o > k:
            k = o
            index = i 
ans = ""           
while s[index]!=")":
    ans += s[index]   
    index += 1
print ans
